title: Biblical References in LoL
body:
7 Deadly Sins (Kalista is after)
{{champion:69}} = Lust
{{champion:120}} = Wrath
{{champion:7}} = Envy
{{champion:127}} = Sloth
{{champion:4}}  = Greed
{{champion:101}} = Gluttony
{{champion:238}} = Pride

7 Virtues
{{champion:40}} = Chastity
{{champion:267}} = Temperance
{{champion:16}} = Charity
{{champion:78}} = Diligence
{{champion:75}} = Patience
{{champion:37}} = Kindness
{{champion:201}} = Humility

7 Demons
{{champion:236}}{{champion:25}}  = Lucifer
{{champion:121}} = Beelzebub
{{champion:19}}  = Aamon
{{champion:90}} = Abaddon
{{champion:268}} = Mammon
{{champion:48}}  = Belphegor
{{champion:266}} = Asmodeus

7 Archangels
{{champion:81}}   = Gabriel
{{champion:10}} = Michael 
{{champion:16}} = Raphael
{{champion:432}}  = Uriel
{{champion:26}} = Jophiel
{{champion:99}} = Chammuel
{{champion:43}} = Zadkiel

4 Horsemen of the Apocalypse
{{champion:40}} = White horse
{{champion:80}} = Red horse
{{champion:9}} = Black horse
{{champion:30}} = Pale  horse

Giant Monsters
{{champion:111}} = Leviathan
{{champion:14}} /{{champion:421}} = Behemoth
{{champion:3}} = Ziz

Evilest of them all
{{champion:17}}{{champion:1}}  = Satan 


Potentially
{{champion:103}} = lust
{{champion:79}}{{champion:31}} {{champion:96}}  = gluttony
{{champion:134}}{{champion:15}}  = greed
{{champion:23}}{{champion:55}} {{champion:63}}{{champion:102}} {{champion:150}}   = wrath
{{champion:268}}{{champion:59}}  = pride
{{champion:120}} = any horseman
{{champion:12}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:45}} = any of the demon
{{champion:429}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:89}} = any of the angel
